entry.title: You ain't nothin' but a horn dog, let me fix you
entry.summary:
Author: tinypeckers

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,845Chapters: 4/4Kudos: 96

Summary: They say the best pet owners are the responsible ones, and Eddie would say he‚Äôs mighty responsible. He keeps Buck happy, fed and watered. He gives him ample treats. Too many, maybe, because Buck has started to help himself whenever Eddie isn‚Äôt looking.Tired of cleaning his pup‚Äôs messes from the floor, and Buck‚Äôs toys, and his leg, Eddie starts to wonder if it‚Äôs about high time to get his pup neutered. After all, they say the most responsible owners are those that spay and neuter their pets and if you love your pet, fix ‚Äòem! Eddie paw-sitively has no choice.Or the fic in which Eddie Dr. Diaz ‚Äòneuters‚Äô Buck with a chastity cage

entry.title: Every Call Brought Us Here
entry.summary:
Author: pandahminium

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,121Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 3

Summary: Chris Diaz is getting married, and the whole 118 A-shift‚Äîretired, promoted, and still hopelessly tangled together‚Äîhas front-row seats at the reception. Buck‚Äôs leg aches, Eddie‚Äôs dress blues sit a little heavier on his shoulders, and Bobby and Athena only watch from candles and framed photos on the memorial table, but their boy is happy and the room is full.At a table that keeps growing to fit whoever shows up, they trade stories about math homework at the station, courthouse vows, twin newborns who never slept at the same time, and the people who got them this far. Ella and Ava pass down Pepa‚Äôs necklace. Emily is welcomed in like she has always been there.And when Chris and Emily share one more piece of news, Buck has to reckon with the fact that he didn‚Äôt just survive long enough to see his son get married‚Äîhe got a life, a family, and a future he never thought he‚Äôd be allowed to keep.¬†(Yes people like Bobby & Athena, and Pepa and Abuela are dead in this story BUT only because it's set far enough in the future they all passed due to old age üò≠)

entry.title: Buck‚Äôs Babbles
entry.summary:
Author: carpediaz

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,713Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 29

Summary: ‚ÄúYou‚Äôre Buck‚Äôs Babbles, right? That‚Äôs your podcast?‚Äù Eddie asks. Buck uncrosses his arms as his eyes widen and he steps closer to Eddie. He looks a little stunned. ‚ÄúUh - y-yeah. It is. How - how do you know that? I don‚Äôt have any of my social media linked to it,‚Äù Buck stutters, stepping closer again. Eddie is peripherally aware of the others staring at them but he can‚Äôt break himself out of the bubble they‚Äôve found themselves in. The reason Eddie is standing where he is right now is standing right in front of him. Buck is standing right in front of him.orThe one where Buck had a podcast and helps Eddie before they meet (and Eddie is totally smitten).

entry.title: So long, London
entry.summary:
Author: Idachen

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,773Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 14

Summary: Texas stank. That was the first clear thought Evan managed to hold onto as he stood alone in the front yard. It smelled awful here ‚Äî like hot asphalt, gasoline, and something vaguely dead ‚Äî and it was blisteringly hot, even though August was nearly gone. In London, the air by late August already turned mildly cold, the kind of cold that crept beneath your Shirt and reminded you summer was only ever a visitor. He couldn‚Äôt say he missed it. He couldn‚Äôt say he missed anything at all. or After a tragic car accident, the Buckley family decided to move from London to El Paso, Texas, to get as far away from everything as possible. In the end, it was just Evan and his father who moved into the house, which was much too big for the two of them. Evan hated it. Or maybe not, he wasn't sure what he felt, if he felt anything at all. School was awful, except for one boy who sometimes made Evan's heart flutter a little and maybe even reminded him of feelings.

entry.title: Being himself
entry.summary:
Author: Poetryobsessedbi

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,948Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 515

Summary: Buck realises that he and Abby will never work out. So as a celebration/solo pity party for himself he goes to the one place that he can completely be himself. It's a small bar, run by his friend justin, that caters to veterans, but especially the ones of the queer variety. When a handsome stranger, who turns out to be a probationary firefighter walks in, it feels like his luck might have turned after all.Or; What if Buck and Eddie met in a bar for queer vets? what if they felt free enough to be themselves, because they knew the other would understand? What if, instead of falling in an instant friendship after the fated grenade in leg, they fell together earlier, in a whole different way? Feat. Buck being a Navy SEAL, Eddie being less repressed, falling in love and finding a family

entry.title: Fading Light
entry.summary:
Author: MissP20

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,710Chapters: 3/10Kudos: 8

Summary: When Eddie and Evan were children, the world felt small and safe‚Äîjust the two of them against everything else. But one summer evening, Eddie was ripped away without warning, leaving Evan confused, alone, and aching for a friend he didn‚Äôt understand had been taken from him. Years later, they carry the weight of that separation, haunted by the what-ifs and the promises that could never be delivered.

entry.title: Evergrowing
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 265,878Chapters: 43/?Kudos: 20

Summary: Athena and Bobby are learning that parenting doesn‚Äôt end when the kids turn eighteen. With three grown children and two still at home, Bobby and Athena find themselves navigating new challenges at every stage of life. Each child carries their own struggles, some spoken and some hidden, but together the family works through the ups and downs with love, patience, and resilience. At the heart of it all, they‚Äôre reminded that family is a bond that grows, shifts, and deepens, no matter how old the kids get.

entry.title: So Wrong...So Right
entry.summary:
Author: ReggietheChickenWhisperer

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,035Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 14

Summary: Rewritten starting at the competition scene with Tommy and Buck.Buck stands up for himself and Eddie against Tommy. Even though Buck has come a long way, he still struggles when he's alone, even more so once he breaks up with Tommy for a second time and is left alone in Eddie's house. But, even though standing up against Tommy felt so right, something will go so horribly wrong.Eddie is in Texas, has been for months. He finally has Chris again, which feels so right. But something is missing, something is wrong. He's stuck working as an Uber and seeing all his friends and family in LA through a phone screen.What will it take for things to finally be right for Buck and Eddie again?

entry.title: The Sunlight Of My Life
entry.summary:
Author: Pnk_strawberry1

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,770Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 25

Summary: When Eddie left for Texas, Buck told himself he‚Äôd be fine. He had the house, the memories, and the silence ‚Äî too much of it.Then a stranger shows up at his door with news that knocks the air out of him: he‚Äôs the father of an eight-year-old girl named Alina Marie Monroe.Oh ‚Äî and her mother‚Äôs dead.When Eddie finally comes home, the two of them fall into a rhythm that feels almost like a family. Almost.But love gets complicated when it‚Äôs the one thing neither of them has ever had the courage to name. Between bedtime stories, quiet mornings, and the ghosts of what-ifs, Buck and Eddie begin to realize that sometimes family isn‚Äôt something you find ‚Äî it‚Äôs something you build, one heartbeat at a time.Or:Buck becomes a dad. Eddie comes home. And somewhere between friendship and forever, they find the sunlight again. ‚òÄÔ∏èFt A short Christopher & Alina Side Story!

entry.title: I'm Scared I'll Never Sleep Again
entry.summary:
Author: idk_words

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,170Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 206

Summary: ‚ÄúI‚Äôm okay, Hen,‚Äù He says, turning to face her. ‚ÄúYou look like you haven‚Äôt slept in a week,‚Äù She states. ‚ÄúI haven‚Äôt,‚Äù Eddie admits, ‚ÄúI mean, I‚Äôve gotten some naps in at the station and when I helped Buck at his house the other day, but other than that nothing, I just can‚Äôt fall asleep at home anymore.‚Äù ‚ÄúWhat do you think has changed?‚Äù Hen asks; she knows what has changed, but she asks anyway. Eddie thinks, ‚ÄúMy bed is just so cold now. I feel like something is missing. I can sleep at Buck‚Äôs, and I can sleep here in the bunks, but for some reason, my bed isn‚Äôt comfortable anymore.‚Äù ‚ÄúYou think the bunks are comfortable?‚Äù Hen asks, looking at him in disbelief. She knows they aren‚Äôt, and she‚Äôs trying to push Eddie towards the answer, but he‚Äôs just not getting it. ‚ÄúNo, it just feels easier to sleep here than at home for some reason,‚Äù Eddie says, then yawns again. OR Eddie can't figure out why he can't fall asleep after Buck moves out of his house. (I added a second chapter to this after realizing that I wanted to add more inbetween the 3 month gap, so if you've already read my fic I've filled in all the blanks if you want to read it again.)

entry.title: The Family We Chose
entry.summary:
Author: buddiecanon118

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 112,519Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 650

Summary: ‚ÄúHi, I‚Äôm Eddie Diaz, Jee-Yun‚Äôs Uncle.‚Äù ‚ÄúMr. Diaz, lovely to put a face to the name.‚Äù She shakes his hand quickly. ‚Äú She talks about you and your husband all the time, and so does Buck whenever he helps out.‚Äù And Eddie should correct her. He really should. He and Buck are decidedly not married, they‚Äôre not even dating. Sure, Eddie‚Äôs though about it, of course he has. They‚Äôve been best friends for years, his son loves him, and they‚Äôve been sleeping in the same bed since he and Christopher got back from El Paso. But Eddie‚Äôs straight, and Buck isn‚Äôt into him like that. He‚Äôs going to correct her. Definitely. He‚Äôs going to look at her and say‚Äì ‚ÄúYep, that‚Äôs me.‚Äù Oh. entry.title: Until I Found You...
entry.summary:
Author: salenora

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,642Chapters: 9/64Kudos: 108

Summary: Buck meets a guy in the grocery store, things, well escalate. Basically Buck gets a stalker, and enters a relationship with an abusive malipulative creep. Joe Goldberg was almost ready to leave LA with Henry, after killing his wife, Love Quinn.But when he stops at the grocery store on his way to the airport, he sees Buck and Buck has become his new obsession. Set after season 3 of You.Season 9 of 911.Bobby is alive, because that's how it should be. The story alternates POVs. Will be stated who POV it is. Mainly Joe and Buck, but others will have a random POV chapter here and there. Note: You don't have to watch YOU to read this. I'll provide enough context to get the idea. It's mostly set in the 911 universe. In this Joe never gives up Henry. Or,Buck is Joe Goldberg's new obsession.

Now years later, hiding his past things start to come out. Or, Buck is Ethan and Maddie is Julie from FROM. They got out after Jim died. Changed their names. Years later things start coming out. entry.title: You‚Äôre the Sun to Me
entry.summary:
Author: ScribblesAfterDark

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,420Chapters: 16/?Kudos: 172

Summary: ‚ÄúSpeaking of‚Ä¶you got any idea what this lunch is about? She was pretty vague when she called.‚Äù Buck paused, then he shook his head, a small frown pulling between his brows. ‚ÄúNope. Not a clue.‚Äù ‚ÄúBut you‚Äôre worried,‚Äù Eddie guessed. Buck gave a half-shrug, trying for casual, though his hand lingered at Tori‚Äôs side like the contact grounded him. ‚ÄúMaddie doesn‚Äôt usually do vague. If she says she wants to talk, she wants to talk.‚Äù Tori let out a babble just then, saving him from saying more. Buck leaned down, pressing a kiss to the top of her head before scooping her into his arms. ‚ÄúGuess we‚Äôll find out soon enough.‚Äù Eddie studied him for a moment. Buck‚Äôs answering smile was soft but a little distracted, like his mind was already skipping ahead to lunch. And Eddie couldn‚Äôt shake the feeling that Maddie‚Äôs words would upend the equilibrium they‚Äôd worked so hard to hold. Or, After years of chaos, they‚Äôve built a life full of love and family, but a hidden secret from Buck‚Äôs past threatens their fragile peace. When the past collides with the present, even the happiest home feels uncertain.

entry.title: All the Ways Home
entry.summary:
Author: 79KJ01

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 49,306Chapters: 28/30Kudos: 331

Summary: After the lawsuit, Evan Buckley built a new life outside the 118‚Äîquiet, careful, controlled. But Los Angeles has a way of pulling him back, and some fires never really go out. When Buck and Eddie find themselves working side-by-side again, the distance they built starts to crumble under everything they never said. From fractured trust to found family, this is a story about healing, home, and the love that finally stops running.
